Label.en: Some viewers praised its realism, but others found it too frightening and graphic, calling it a monstrosity.
Label.fr: Certains visiteurs ont loué son réalisme, mais d'autres l'ont considéré comme une monstruosité car trop effrayant et trop graphique
Label.es: Some viewers praised its realism, but others found it too frightening and graphic, calling it a monstrosity.
